snippet.title: Unearthing Mars -- Official Trailer | PS VR
snippet.description:
The official trailer for Unearthing Mars, a new VR adventure from Winking Entertainment. 
http://www.unearthingmars.com/en/index.html

Unearthing Mars is a VR adventure game set on the mysterious Red Planet. 

As Co-Pilot of the retrieval team, the player will have the full experience of a space explorer on Mars.

Unearthing Mars provides hours of unique gameplay experiences, ranging from navigating a landing craft through a sandstorm to driving a Mars rover. From puzzle-solving to first-person shooting, the game will allow players to resolve challenges from a variety of game genres.

http://www.unearthingmars.com/en/index.html

Copyright © 2017 WINKING ENTERTAINMENT Ltd. All Rights Reserved.
